text: The Columbus Zoo and Aquarium is a zoo in Ohio, United States. It is one of the largest zoos in the world in terms of area () and species of animals (about 790). The zoo is located north of Columbus, in Powell, Ohio. There are about 10,000 individual animals in the zoo. ==References== * The Top Ten Largest Zoos in the World Category:Zoos in the United States Category:Columbus, Ohio
title: Columbus Zoo and Aquarium
